alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coweta; Fayette; Harris; Heard; Meriwether; South Fulton; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Fayette, Meriwether, southern Carroll, Heard, Troup, Coweta, southwestern Fulton and northern Harris Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Handy to Corinth to Long Cane, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, LaGrange, Hamilton, Franklin, Greenville, Peachtree City, Tyrone, Palmetto, West Point, Hogansville, Grantville, Pine Mountain, Luthersville, Whitesburg, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, and Roopville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central, northwestern and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Coweta; Fayette; Harris; Heard; Meriwether; South Fulton; Troup
